get.summary: Gets all the plugins for the requested range
A filtered view of plugins that match the query

post.summary: Upload a plugin creating a new plugin or replacing an existing

delete.summary: Deletes an existing Plugin using its name

get.summary: Retrieves a plugin given its name

post.summary: Saves a new or updates a Plugin

get.summary: Download the plugin archive
Download file within the plugin archive
Lists of all the file/directory entries in the plugin archive

post.summary: Creates a new empty spreadsheet
post.description: Note the request BODY must be empty

get.summary: Gets all the metadata entries for the given range

delete.summary: Deletes an existing spreadsheet using its ID

get.summary: Retrieves metadata about a spreadsheet given its id

post.summary: Updates the metadata of the given spreadsheet.

patch.summary: Updates the metadata of the given spreadsheet.

get.summary: Gets all the cells that would fit the given viewport
Gets the cells

post.summary: Saves or replaces a cell

patch.summary: Patches a cell using the provided delta

delete.summary: Deletes a cell or range of cells

post.summary: Fills a cell or range of cells with the contents

get.summary: Finds all cells within the selection that match the value type and query expression
Prepares a form for input
Finds all labels with the given selection
Finds all cell references for the given selection
Sorts the selected cells using the provided comparators

parameters.name: comparators
parameters.description: column | row EQUALS-SIGN comparator-name COMMA last-comparator-name SEMI-COLON next column/row EQUALS-SIGN etc

patch.summary: Updates the column of the given spreadsheet.

post.summary: clears the column or column-range, which includes deleting any cells
Inserts a given number of columns *after* the given column or column-range
Inserts a given number of columns *before* the given column or column-range

get.summary: Formats the sample values for the given SpreadsheetFormatter

post.summary: Creates a new label.

delete.summary: Deletes the given label and its mapping target

get.summary: Returns ALL Parser available to the enclosing Spreadsheet
Returns the named SpreadsheetParserInfo if available to the enclosing Spreadsheet

Accepts a request containing SpreadsheetParserSelector returning the SpreadsheetParserSelectorToken(s)

patch.summary: Updates a rows within the given spreadsheet.

post.summary: clears the row or row-range, which includes deleting any cells

Inserts a given number of rows *before* the given row or row-range
